title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, October 30, 2020
description: It's the 85th birthday of biographer Robert Caro, who once said, “The power of the historian is the power of the truth, a very basic thing.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the 85th birthday of biographer Robert Caro, who once said, “The power of the historian is the power of the truth, a very basic thing.”
